name: Paperless-ngx
short_desc: A community-supported supercharged version of paperless with Active Directory support
author: Paperless-ngx Team
description: Paperless-ngx is a document management system that transforms your physical documents into a searchable online archive so you can keep, well, less paper. This enhanced version includes Active Directory authentication support via LDAP, making it perfect for enterprise environments. It features automatic OCR processing, full-text search, tags and metadata organization, machine learning powered suggestions, and a modern web interface. Perfect for digitizing and organizing invoices, receipts, contracts, and any paper documents with enterprise-grade authentication.

form_fields.label: Authentication > Admin Username
form_fields.hint: Username for the admin account (leave empty to create via web interface)

form_fields.label: Authentication > Admin Password
form_fields.hint: Password for the admin account (leave empty to create via web interface)

form_fields.label: Authentication > Admin Email
form_fields.hint: Email address for the admin account

form_fields.label: Database > Redis Password
form_fields.hint: Password for Redis cache database (auto-generated if empty)

form_fields.label: Security > Secret Key
form_fields.hint: Django secret key for encryption (leave empty for auto-generation)

form_fields.label: Web Interface > Application URL
form_fields.hint: Full URL where Paperless-ngx will be accessible (e.g., https://paperless.domain.com)

form_fields.label: OCR > OCR Language
form_fields.hint: Primary language for OCR processing (3-letter ISO code)

form_fields.label: OCR > Additional Languages
form_fields.hint: Additional OCR languages separated by spaces (e.g., 'eng fra deu')

form_fields.label: OCR > Skip Archive File
form_fields.hint: When to skip creating archived PDF files

form_fields.label: Consumer > Polling Interval (seconds)
form_fields.hint: How often to check for new documents in consume folder

form_fields.label: Consumer > Polling Delay (seconds)
form_fields.hint: Delay before processing a new document

form_fields.label: Consumer > Retry Count
form_fields.hint: Number of retry attempts for failed documents

form_fields.label: Consumer > Recursive Processing
form_fields.hint: Process documents in subdirectories of consume folder

form_fields.label: Security > Enable Audit Log
form_fields.hint: Log all user actions for security auditing

form_fields.label: Interface > Documents per Page
form_fields.hint: Number of documents to display per page

form_fields.label: Features > Enable Flower Monitoring
form_fields.hint: Enable Celery monitoring interface (advanced users)

form_fields.label: Active Directory > LDAP URL
form_fields.hint: LDAP/LDAPS URL for Active Directory authentication (e.g., ldaps://ad.domain.com:636)

form_fields.label: Active Directory > Domain (FQDN)
form_fields.hint: Fully qualified domain name for Active Directory

form_fields.label: Active Directory > UPN Domain
form_fields.hint: UPN domain suffix for user login (fallback if user omits domain)

form_fields.label: Active Directory > Search Base
form_fields.hint: LDAP search base DN for user lookups

form_fields.label: Active Directory > Service User
form_fields.hint: Username for LDAP bind operations (with read permissions)

form_fields.label: Active Directory > Service Password
form_fields.hint: Password for the LDAP service user

form_fields.label: Active Directory > User Group CN
form_fields.hint: Common Name of group whose members can login to Paperless

form_fields.label: Active Directory > Admin Group CN
form_fields.hint: Common Name of group whose members are Paperless administrators
